taskDescription: Find the circumference of the circle with radius equal to 3 cm.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>2</mn>
  <mi>π<!-- π --></mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mi>π<!-- π --></mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>18.85</mn>
  <mtext> cm</mtext>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C = 2\pi (3) = 6\pi  = 18.85\text{ cm}</annotation></semantics></math>
